labels.analysis: The MCP Server specializes in performing real-time Google searches with advanced features like anti-bot bypass and automatic CAPTCHA handling. It extracts structured search results and supports multiple languages and regions, making it particularly useful for AI assistants. The server also saves browser session state to enhance search efficiency and reliability. This indicates its primary role is web search with advanced capabilities to bypass common restrictions and extract data in a usable format.
labels.reasoning: The primary label is "Web Search & Research" because the server's core functionality revolves around performing and optimizing Google searches. The ability to bypass anti-bot measures and CAPTCHAs suggests some degree of browser automation, but that is a secondary aspect supporting the main search functionality. The tool is specifically designed to assist AI assistants with structured search results, reinforcing its research-oriented use case.

limit.description: 返回的搜索结果数量，默认为10

timeout.description: 搜索操作的超时时间(毫秒)，默认为60000

language.description: 搜索结果的语言，例如 zh-CN, en-US 等，默认为 zh-CN

region.description: 搜索结果的地区，例如 cn, com, co.jp 等，默认为 cn

server_info_crawled.name: Google Search
server_info_crawled.author: @modelcontextprotocol-servers/google-search-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Perform real-time Google searches with anti-bot bypass and automatic CAPTCHA handling. Extract structured search results in multiple languages and regions for AI assistants. Save browser session state to improve search efficiency and reliability.

limit.description: 返回的搜索结果数量，默认为10

timeout.description: 搜索操作的超时时间(毫秒)，默认为60000

language.description: 搜索结果的语言，例如 zh-CN, en-US 等，默认为 zh-CN

region.description: 搜索结果的地区，例如 cn, com, co.jp 等，默认为 cn

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@modelcontextprotocol-servers/google-search-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
